column1: Little Goat Diner////Split 1/2 each of the BBQ Pork sandwich and the scallion pancake pork belly sandwich and each were inventive
column2: interesting and delicious.  They both combined sweet
column3: savory with textures and neither were the same from the first bite to the last.  Delicious.  I wished each had a little more pork and that would really be my only comment.  The BBQ pork sandwich had a little too much bread to filling for my liking.  I will be back to try more.  It's a terrific menu with great service and a fun vibe.
